website_summaries.verdict: The Roku Express 2019 is an excellent streamer. It's easy to use and offers the cheapest access to Roku's superb operating system.
pros: The Roku Express (2019) is an affordable, easy-to-use mini streamer with access to thousands of apps
Load times and app performance are quick and reliable
cons: Lacks the TV control buttons and point-anywhere voice remote included on the more-expensive Express Plus and Amazon Fire TV Stick

customer_reviews.title: Do not pay an activation fee!
customer_reviews.text: We now have three of these devices in our home to help save on our cable bill. We use them for the spectrum app and they work great! Very easy to set up. A word to the wise - I read a couple of reviews about an activation fee. I set two of these up today and there is no activation fee!! If you are being asked to pay a fee you are in the wrong place! Do not google the set up website - type in the address as it is when prompted on the screen and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Dawson

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC device for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Roku and it works just as good as the rest. Don't be scared off by the 2.4 GHz wireless connection, I'm watching YouTube TV at full 1080p with plenty of speed left over. Unless your network has a history of problems with 2.4 GHz connections, or you require 4K UHD quality, this is a great device that can be powered by your TV's USB port.
customer_reviews.author: KJinthe417

customer_reviews.title: My Neck, My Back, My NETFLIX and my SNACKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been working on overtime, a 2nd job and my damn nerves, to do what??? Spend all my money on cable and diet water??? Not anymore!!! I decided to invest in a Roku to alleviate half of my stress! I had no idea the number of free channels at my disposal. And they are full of shows that I will actually watch and like!!! I am actually glad to come home to my spinster life of watching tv with my pets and practicing Spam Sculpture Art. I have watched classic tv shows and new and fresh ones now. Grab one while the prices are low!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel in Florida

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: Installing this new 2019 version of the Roku streaming "box," it messed up my TV, my cable and my head. There was no telephone or online support for the problems I was contending with, only a disembodied voice when I called that said there were videos available online. I looked at them but they did not help. Fortunately, my friendly local cable company came to the rescue and explained how the system could work, making it a very pesky operation. Had I known there was no support, I would not have purchased this item and will probably look for a product from a different manufacturer given my feelings about Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t show of full screen
customer_reviews.text: Picture when watching videos, shows, etc. only shows on top left corner of tv screen.
customer_reviews.author: Zao X Yang

customer_reviews.title: Love it but call Amazon if you're going to use it to watch prime video's!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Roku! Word of advice, if you're going to use it for Amazon prime video, call Amazon to set it up. I was told by Roku that if I didn't register my Roku with them for $70 for 5 years or $100 for one time payment my Roku would not work, not even to use on Amazon prime, this is totally false..
customer_reviews.author: #1Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Failed to activate
customer_reviews.text: I bought the express 2019 to replace an old one that is still fully working. Alas, I was not able to activate the device on the Roku Server networks even though it successfully attached to my wireless network, I kept getting “error 1”. I own 5 Roku devices and never have any issues with them. Perhaps the most frustrating issue was that I could not find any live help for the Installation. I think is time for me to start lookin at the Fire. I returned it to Amazon yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up but I'm not a big fan of adding my credit card information if it's not necessary (and it wasn't). There should a skip this process option. We purchased this to replace one of our xfinity/Comcast boxes that we were renting...it did the job with the xfinity app. Very happy, we will be adding another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon prime member

customer_reviews.title: ROKU is affordable TV without the cost of cable
customer_reviews.text: I cut the cord and have 3 different Roku players in my house - I love them all There are a lot of FREE apps you can use with the ROKU if you pay for Amazon Prime there are a lot of free movies and shows to watch thru the Roku I pay for Philo which is a TV app with like 40 channels at $15 a month and I pay for OAN a news app at $5 a month and CBS all access app at $9 a month so now I watch all the TV that I want for $29 a month instead of the $95+ I was paying to cable company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda V

customer_reviews.title: Junk with no customer service
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up correctly and nothing happens. The light in the roku is on, but my tv says “no signal” on that input. And there is no customer service available for this device...jut a bunch of useless articles that you have to sift through. The applicable article was written for a moron and didn’t actually solve my problem. Disappointed. Angry. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Authentic Sustenance

customer_reviews.title: Fast Compared to Roku Stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my second television and it is much faster than the Roku stick I have in the other television. For the price, you can't beat it! Extremely easy to set up and use. No complaints. I'm going to replace my Roku stick with this device.
customer_reviews.author: dw10

customer_reviews.title: VERY SURPRISED
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hulu for several months but it kept my laptop tied up. I decided to try this as an alternative to buying another computer. I was totally shocked at the difference in picture quality and over all dependency of Hulu over the ROKU network. I was, also, surprised to realize Roku provided a number of shows and movies free of any additional charges. Yes, there are movies and shows you can rent but these are totally free. I highly recommend this to any one considering this option.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! It’s only single band 2.4 GHz compatible.
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world would an HD streaming unit only have single band wireless? So you literally cannot connect to the higher, faster 5 GHz wireless connections. This roku can’t stream consistently. It keeps cutting off and reloading. I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: C. Breslin Creates

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I own or have owned nearly every version of Roku. I find this box for the price to be a very good deal. Compared to my Ultra or 4k streaming Roku stick, it's performance is acceptable. Yes, the higher priced ones are nicer, include things like headphone jacks, better wifi, etc. But for the price, this one performs above expectations, is easy to set up, and is a great value. The only thing really lacking is the ability to program the TV on/off and volume, I assume that feature was left off for price purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE. ROKU DOESN'T ANSWER THEIR PHONES. IT WAS NOT AN EASY SET UP. COULDN'T GET ASSISTANCE TO SET UP SO IT WAS RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: linda f.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of spam
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed when after starting up Roku the code didn't go through gave me a number to call the person on the other side I could hardly understand about 20 other people talking in the background, all in all at the end of conversation I was asked to pay $100. for five years or $150. for forever. Roku never ask for any information or payment to them. Please Beware from this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Would not show my WiFi network but showed everyone living around me. Since no Ethernet couldn’t connect. Roku customer service was just a never ending circle of press this number for this problem which always took you into prerecorded messages. Finally got a real person on line but could hardly understand him and obviously he was from a call center India. Customer support for roku is barely above lousy
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Roku through Amazon last year for my bedroom TV. I just recently bought another Roku from Amazon for my living room TV. I absolutely love them. I live in the US but I love British Murder mysteries. My Roku allows my to watch my British shows through 3 streaming channels I pay for and through multiple FREE channels only available through a Roku. And the best part I’m 70 years old and I hooked up both by myself in less than a minute! Best money I ever spent and surprisingly affordable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Constantly getting error code 020. On screen guidance has you disconnect everything to reboot. Website has no better solution. Probably going to return it if I can’t get it resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Not good for us
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say I *LOVE* this Roku Express. whenever we use it, EVERYTHING gets kicked off the internet. Before Roku Express was hooked up, I streamed movies, played online video game on my laptop, hubby played his game on a tablet and both our cell phones connected to wifi. NOW... only our ROKU can be connected to our wi-fi internet. THE ONLY REASON we purchased the Roku Express - our 5 year old smart TV no longer can access Amazon Prime , (but can still access Hulu, Netflix, and Vudu) ............I can live with out Amazon Prime, but not my online games.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

customer_reviews.title: Great simple device for adding smart features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old son as his TV is not a smart TV. It adds apps like Netflix, Disney plus and youtube among others. It's not 4k and doesn't have some of the bells and whistles some other higher priced streaming devices have but that is fine for a kid or non 4k TVs. The setup is pretty easy and FREE, I have seen some reviews where people are saying they are being asked to pay. Any paid services can be bypassed when setting up. You don't have to pay for any additional features except for services you want like Netflix,Disney Etc. Pro Tip: Check out the App PlutoTv it's basically free cable television.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It forces me to create a paid account!
customer_reviews.text: I have read similar reviews here: during the installation, the roku.com website forced me to submit my payment information. Instead of giving my credit card info, I used PayPal, then it forced PayPal to create a charge. I did not approve the charge, then, the installation was locked out. I then repeated the process, this time instead of moving forward with payment, I hit the back button of the browser, then it let me finish the installation. I don't think this is a malware, but it is Roku's intention to force customers into giving them payment information. SO LAME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Minh N. Ho

customer_reviews.title: It was ok...  but I’m returning it for another firestick
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it. Heard a lot of ppl say that it was better than a firestick... but I just don’t see it. Maybe for some, but not for me. Don’t like how I wasn’t able to turn on tv or change volume like I could with a firestick. The final straw was not being able to use a web browser.. maybe not a big deal for some but it was for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dunklebucks

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The most exciting thing about Roku Express HD Streaming Media Player 2019 is that you can stream xfinity channel line-up for your xfinity package. You don't need an xfinity box to do so, therefore you don't have to pay to rent a box. There are also so many channels to choose from. I am a classic movie lover and I found so many classic movie channels, classic western channels and classic cartoon channels to choose from. Great product for the price. I will definitely purchase 3 more for the other 3 tv's in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Scam!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a scam. You must buy their streaming movie channel. Almost every channel cost money, your better off staying with TV supplier. The sport channel are outrages in Price. I will work with this product, but right now, I think it headed to trash. .
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hoshaw

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even get to try it out
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday, tried setting it up this morning and it did some automatic update that led the screen to be stuck on the bouncing logo. I tried everything from unplugging it for a bit, and using a pin to re set it, but nothing worked. Will be returning. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Peace of junk.please don't buy this roku.i have to reset it every time I use it.and there is no customer support at all.
customer_reviews.author: Presley Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Roku and Disney+- Win Win
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The install was pretty straightforward, I purchased two of these so I could stream Disney +. Unfortunately, the Amazon Fire Stick does not support Disney+. The Mandalorian- All of the Disney Classics, All of the Franchise films LucasFilm, Marvel, etc. Amazon is loosing out here. Too bad. The Roku device, for the price is a very reasonable way to access the Disney+ content without fiddling around with another streaming subscription/ other that the Disney+ subscription of course.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Freezes up a lot! No OFF button?!?! Stays warm all the time!
customer_reviews.text: First and last one I buy. First thing is it has no OFF button so the unit stays warm all the time which can’t be good on longevity. Also eats data compared to other devices. It is easy setup but it freezes up a lot and you have to unplug it to start over and it doesn’t save what your watching to the correct spot. I have very fast WiFi for other devices and it still freezes with everything else turned off. I would guess a software problem.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Activation Fee?
customer_reviews.text: I received my Roku Express HD today and began setting it up. Following the instructions provided to the letter I began setting up a Roku account so I could activate my Roku. Part way through it asked for my credit card or PayPal information. Apparently, there is no way to activate the device without doing this. I am unwilling to do this just so I can use their product. I am returning it and getting another Firestick because a Firestick does not require a credit card to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Xfinity Cable TV user? ...You’ll love this
customer_reviews.text: As an xfinity (Comcast) cable customer I love my tv but don’t want to pay a recurring $10 fee for all additional tv boxes in my house. Enter this device. This can plug into your tv’s HDMI and has an Xfinity stream app which has all your tv channels as well as DVR recordings. Works like a charm even on wireless. I put mine in my garage for my workout setup in front of my treadmill. If your smart tv doesn’t have the Xfinity stream app built in then get this device and stream away I never even mentioned that it streams Amazon prime / Netflix / Hulu - basically everything you’d want to stream. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Jay

customer_reviews.title: Small, convenient & inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read instructions. Quick setup. I am so happy to be able to stream my online tutorials on my TV now instead of my small phone screen!!! Perfect for those with perfectly good TVs that aren't smart but want easy access to apps, live streaming & more. My only problem is the remote is just too small. It gets easily lost in the sea of crafting materials so easily. We have an older model with a somewhat larger remote. I might have to go back to double check to compare though. Great device. Highly recommend. Much cheaper than buying a new TV or bluray player.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Samsung smart tv and held off ordering any kind of Roku-like device for fear it wouldn't work with my tv. Comments I read suggested the Roku Express for my circumstances. Wow. So easy to set up, even for this 70-year-old woman. Beautiful picture quality. So many channel options. Particularly timely due to the quarantine. Now, with so many viewing options, my fear is that I'll never want to leave the house. Highly recommend for anyone who just wants a simple device that works really well.
customer_reviews.author: C Richards

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out for Built-in Scam!
customer_reviews.text: Set-up directs you to a web site to complete account set-up by entering a code from screen. Web-site says code is locked and gives number to call. Call goes to third party, Hern IT, that charges $80 to initiate account which is against Roku's advertised policy. This is a scam and since it is built into device, I suspect Roku is in on it. Called Roku and was told they warn against thrid party scams. Then why does their set-up direct you to one?
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: credit card
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely HATE that I have to give Roku a credit card number. I have no plans to ever use Roku to purchase anything. I do not want to give a credit card number to anyone if it's not necessary. The product itself is fine, at least so far. But the product doesn't work without a Roku account, and that requires a credit card. So, my rating is a result of what is required to make this thing work. I will be replacing it as soon as I can find another solution.
customer_reviews.author: Patman

customer_reviews.title: Speed is the same, remote is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I had a ROKU stick with remote that worked for at least seven years. I recently heard that Netflix would no longer support that version so I upgraded to the new 2019 HDMI ROKU. I don't see any better speed, and the construction of the remote itself feels way cheaper. As compared to seven years, I wonder how long this new remote will work.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless performance issue
customer_reviews.text: I have this unit literally 10 feet from a modern, high speed router operating at both 2 and 5 GHz and a fiber optic connection to the internet. Wireless at my house screams for every device except for one; this Roku. I constantly get warnings about a slow connection. I'm at wit's end; I've gone into the 'secret' menu and disabled/enabled network ping. I've moved it up, down, around the room. Doesn't matter. Slow connection to the internet; yet every other device I test gets between 80-90 Mbps. So wishing I had purchased one with an Ethernet port. Maybe it would help if this thing had an external antenna connection, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McCann

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly right out of the box. Setup instructions very clear, easy to follow. Took, maybe, 5 mins most of that time was entering id's and passwords for my Netflix and other services.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Brit

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Roku Fee's
customer_reviews.text: I learned this today. If you already own a Roku and you're on a "basic" plan, whatever that is, if you buy another Roku before you can activate it you have to pay $100 for 3 years of premium service or $149 for a lifetime premium service. I am returning this and will buy a firestick. New Roku will fail to activate, telling you to call support. When I called they said they would upgrade my account to premium. When I asked if there was a charge, i was told the price. When I said that I didn't want to do it, I was told that it was already done. I was mad that I was tricked into extra charges.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Do not pay subscription fee!
customer_reviews.text: Great--works perfect and didn't take long for a tech novice like me to set up. I, however, almost got taken for the one time activation fee, but only knew not to do it because of reading a review on amazon beforehand. I had gone to the website exactly as shown in the pamphlet that came with the product and got a pop up with a chat saying this service rep wanted to help me get set up--ok sure, until he mentioned the activation fee! Quickly I said no and "x-ed" out of the conversation. Do not be fooled by these scammers--product does NOT require "one-time activation fee" to work!
customer_reviews.author: ss11sj

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Okay so let me start by saying the TV that this is being hooked up to is a 1080p it is an old television that was never used except for gaming in my son's room. I did not feel like spending the extra money for a extra cable box in his room so I decided to buy this and it has turned out as an excellent option with this he now has a working television in his room we use it to stream Netflix Amazon prime and there are various other free options that come with it. There may be better options out there but for the money this seems to work perfect no lag no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. A great upgade
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to use streaming device. Streaming services can be loaded from the Roku app so you only see what you need (in my case Netflix/Prime video/YouTube) and avoid all unwanted apps usually seen on a smart TV. A great upgrade for a nonsmart TV or an outdated smart TV (I bought 3 already @24.00 each). The only inconvenience is the remote that only has Roku functions, no tv power/channel/volume/source. But there's a 14 dll programmable remote here on Amazon that adds exactly those buttons while keeping the Roku functions untouched. I don't care about picture quality HD 4K 8K and all that crap...
customer_reviews.author: Dante Villa

customer_reviews.title: Parents beware.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son’s room for him to watch Disney+ and YouTube TV, as his older smart TV didn’t support those apps. I was disgusted and incredibly disappointed by the screen savers available and the content available on this device. I was NOT able to filter and block pictures of naked women from the screensaver store on this. We are trying to safeguard our home and the content allowed in it, yet this thing was loaded with mature images that I could not block. This needs revamped and redone. There is no need for filth on a Roku.
customer_reviews.author: angTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice, and beware you are being asked to pay a fee.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but same as others there is NO ACTIVATION fee. If you're getting an error on the code and told to call a number don't do it, or make sure you are on the official Roku site. I first used my phone to try and set it up and I accidentally selected the first webpage that showed up, and it was obvious not a Roku page then I looked at the web address and it was not a Roku address. So I changed to my computer and was able to connect to the correct site. My screen is even sharper than when I was using the xfinity box.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Grant

customer_reviews.title: I believe is the best...
customer_reviews.text: I have in my house three different (don't ask me why, all of them are presents to me) models - Roku, Amazon fire stick and Chromecast stick. The last one is the very worst one having a hard time to communicate with latest Samsung model. Amazon fire stick is good as well, but Roku to my personal experience is the best - easy to install, easy to work, and it is very reliable. What possibly else you can ask for - it is much worth for the price and for the service. I love it, therefore I got another one and Chromecast would sit in the box forever. Thank you Roku designers.
customer_reviews.author: Ilia G Iliev

customer_reviews.title: ita not responding even i connect it
customer_reviews.text: when i connect it to tv nothing happened even i try to put my tv in hdmi. still nothing happen. its not responding even i already connect it
customer_reviews.author: Jakeson fernandez

customer_reviews.title: No Ethernet port
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this instead of the newer Roku stick because the room where we want to use it doesn't get wifi. The description of the product does not tell you that it only works on wifi and doesn't have an ethernet port. Even if we had wifi, the ethernet cable would be a much faster connection, so it is very disappointing that they don't disclose this important feature in the description. Can't use it. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B. Cutts

customer_reviews.title: Wifi signal is super weak compared to last year model
customer_reviews.text: No idea what the issue is. I have 2 Expresses from the previous year, but this new one seems to struggle with the connection. The network options say EXCELLENT connection quality, yet all the apps randomly say no internet and video randomly stutters on my home 1GB fiber line.
customer_reviews.author: Mozgus

customer_reviews.title: number 2 and still awesome
customer_reviews.text: still one of the best streaming devices ive ever bought. Best bang for your buck. easy to set up works great and has everything i need for streaming basic services. The only negative and its not really that big of a deal is that if im standing too close to the IR sensor and not aiming directly at it the remote has a hard time making the connection at anything less than 6 feet. luckily ive learned lately that social distancing can make things so much better and by just stepping back a few more feet the problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: gary wigington jr

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I really love the roku but it seems to have so many glitches. For awhile we couldn't get any videos to play on YouTube. Then the ads on Hulu cut parts of the show out and you cant rewind to view them. (It doesnt do this on our tablets or phones, only roku). Now amazon prime TV wont open at all. I've restarted it, deleted channels, tried updates,etc etc. I still seem to keep having glitches. After a couple months the YouTube problem resolved, not sure how. But hulu and amazon prime apps are still having issues.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Smith

customer_reviews.title: ROKU is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on a third TV. I bought a ROKU TV and liked it so much I purchased a ROKU for another TV I had. I liked them both so much I purchased this one for my third. I enjoy the free stations that have a lot of older programs on that I enjoy. It's easy to use. My streaming is very good as well. I am hoping ROKU stays in business. I will purchase ROKU TV's from now on if they are available. Most of their add on devices are very good. I would always want to purchase their later models they are always improving.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am not too educated when it comes to all these new devices used for streaming. I still use a DVD player, to give you a better example. I do have an Amazon streaming device on another TV, but I feel like I am essentially attached to Amazon using it. I was pleasantly surprised that the Roku is just a free streaming device. It works great, no issues. It was easy to set up and my 5 year old can maneuver and use it. This is definitely my preferred device.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Koch

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The main reason that I purchased this us to stream the xfinity app which isn't available on most platforms. One week in and it has worked well. The remote is very simple to use, but it does still use IR technology and doesn't have a speech recognition feature like some of the newer versions.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect streaming device for me
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down and put a tv in my bedroom. I needed something to use because it’s not a smart tv and I don’t want to run cable. This is perfect. Can watch Hulu and Netflix. Even has xfinity beta app which is what I most needed. Set up was easy. No issue at all. Even downloaded an app to my phone that makes my phone the remote. I can transfer the sound to my phone and use headphones at night as to not disturb anyone. Very good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective
customer_reviews.text: I set it all up, and then there was a bit of buffering when my toddler was trying to watch, I understand that though, it is streaming afterall. However later on the device was fast forwarding/skipping out of no where, the screen would sometimes go black and then come back. Not sure if it is the HDMI they sent me doing that? I have a firestick and ps4 that both have been used on that tv and I've never had an issue with picture or streaming. I'll be returning for a firestick. I was excited to try out Roku but, not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Monique LeCount

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Alexa after being linked.
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through the pairing set-up with Amazon tech support - no way to get in touch with a Roku tech support person - but was not able to get my Amazon Echo (Alexa) to communicate with my Roku Express (Model 3930R). We tried everything and all phrasing suggested. Both are on the same wifi (2.4 Ghz) at close range with no interference. The linking was confirmed on both Amazon Echo and Alexa App. I wonder whether it is really possible to work this Roku model with Alexa, as advertised. The Roku platform works fine, but not through Alexa voice command.
customer_reviews.author: mangosof

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I have a smart TV but it's made to where the factory has installed the apps and I can't get any new ones so I got the Roku and I am extremely happy because instead of cable I have Philo $20 a month and I'm good to go along with my Netflix and Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.author: Cupcakemom

customer_reviews.title: Roku, too pushy to get my CC info
customer_reviews.text: First, it was not working with Xfinity wifi, had to spend some time googling around. Not acceptable for something that should be almost plug-n-play. Then when I managed to have it connected, it insisted in having me set a credit card (and no info about how much they wanted to charge), no way to go around that screen. I have most of my streaming from Netflix, Fubotv, Youtube, so don't want to pay more for content, just want to have an extra option to rent movies, and then setup CC info if i want to. By being too pushy, you lost my business Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Fede Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend a higher model
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these Roku express devices, hoping to save some money and still get the same quality experience as the previous TVs and players we had from Roku. However, the remote is incompatible with Roku TVs and does not have a volume button. The sticky tape provided for mounting the device is very weak and I needed to buy additional adhesive to keep it in the place. Lastly, the charging port is very fragile, the device fell about 2 feet and the charging port bent to the point it will not hold the charging cable anymore. I would suggest sticking to one of the more premium Roku devices.
customer_reviews.author: Dippolar

customer_reviews.title: Roku Customers  service not been train how to talk to buyers
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it back because it was $120 to activate the roku. The customer service was very rude when I asked why I have to pay $120 then his response was the roku for poor people can’t pay channels . I don’t think he knows what his talking about this person don’t need To be a customer service because he is very rude . He thinks that people only buys roku because they are so poor can’t pay cable . That’s not the way you selling stuff other wise he needs customers service training ..
customer_reviews.author: genara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is thrilled with this Roku Express!! His old streaming stick just stopped working recently, and he missed watching all the movies, TV shows, and sports. He said this worked perfectly right out of the box, was easy to install, and is small enough to fade into the background. No reason to buy the more expensive models, unless you must have a voice-activated remote. This inexpensive model does the trick!!!
customer_reviews.author: BaaBee3

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got one a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: My husband was skeptical with this and was even suggesting we get more cable boxes for our house. No longer needed, as our provider has an app for the Roku. It was very easy to set up as long as the intructions were followed. Absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 1080p streamer hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon asked about volume control. I dont know about that but what i do know is for $25, even at only 1080p, when paired on my $60 Seiki 40-inch TV, its the bomb. Is even good at streaming in a somewhat dead zone of house.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Disassembly

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: We have the Roku stick and loved it but for our spare room we wanted a more budget friendly option as it will not be used as much. I definitely recommend this roku as it is exactly as described however, until I had the remote that did it all I didn't know what I was missing. Definitely spend the extra little bit to get the roku with the voice remote and power button. This one does not have that ability but it is still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but misses an opportunity with the remote.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge ROKU fan for the interface and bringing all of my decoupled streaming services together in an awesome platform. The only cons to this little guy are as follows: You can buy the 4k capable version for less than $10 bucks more, but I knew that when I purchased. The remote is NOT the remote that comes with power and volume keys and pairs with your TV. This means that you're forced to use two remotes. ROKU should bundle all units with the remote that has universal simple functions. It doesn't add much costwise for them and would GREATLY enhance the experience for all ROKU players.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: WOW.. Awesome Experience especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Previously was streaming through a Sony Bluray Player and it was painful ! It would take forever to load up, would get hung up scrolling through the program choices and the Audio would randomly drop out. This Roku rocks!! It also has an Iphone app to control it that also enables you to attach your headphone to listen privately for example at night when other are sleeping. What also knocked me out is I couldn't understand a line so I rewound it twice and it AUTOMATICALLY put up the subtitles in the area I rewound to and then they turned off automatically when I was watching in virgin territory I hadn't seen yet! VERY COOL! BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood Soundman

customer_reviews.title: I love this device!
customer_reviews.text: I live by myself, can't stand local t.v. station, cable us too expensive plus the shows are the greatest...with Roku you are in 100% in control; if you want to pay for a premium channel you can and it doesn't come with other yucky stations. I watch YouTube 95% of the time, I already am a Prime member so I can watch movies on that channel and Netflix has many great shows. I'm very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: rjf

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone else said, the set up was very easy. The only hard part is getting signed in to Netflix, Hulu, etc., and picking content. No fault of Roku and my wife loves it. We now have a smart TV that wasn't one before. Saved me some money until we buy a new TV. Worth every cent. The only thing I couldn't figure out was how to run it through my receiver to get better sound. Oh well, I may figure it out later or just be okay with the tv speakers. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: A lifestyle improvment
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Roku. Even a Luddite like me could set it up and now I'm enjoying all my Amazon prime shows/movies (Brideshead and Downton forever), plus incredible YouTube arts documentaries that I never knew existed. I expect there's more to get out of it, but for now that's fine. Good-bye 11-inch laptop screen. UPDATE: Three days later. The remote has stopped working. Roku makes different remotes and my mine is the basic without something called the pairing button. So frustrating and annoying. I will try different batteries before returning. I've been online, to YouTube, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus

customer_reviews.title: Passwords Are Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We found this to be a confusing maze of passwords, cable subscription approvals, subscription sign ups, and free trials. It's sort of like a portal to 1000 other services, and whichever you select will has it's own independent account. So I guess it's OK. A+ for screen quality and OS. Note you can't even activate this thing without a "payment method". So make sure you are at home, have a credit card in hand, and your entire password inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great little streamer!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and great price for our bedroom TV + price + size + 3m like mounting tape for firm attachment to TV + set up time and lack of complexity + Roku set up assist program + performance - remote doesn’t support my TV controls We are a cable-free household and I have found Roku in each of our TVs(one is integrated in the TV) has improved the user experience to a point we don’t miss out TV service at all. We utilize over air antennas, Amazon prime and Sling. Plus have streamed a few other channels on Roku. Still a little slower than a TV by bundled service but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Snobot

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the Roku Express. We bought the Roku because we can't stream our cable service app on our FireStick which is really disappointing. We installed it on the TV in our office and it works fantastic and lets us stream all our favorite apps and yes that includes the Spectrum app which I wish was included on our FireStick. The only downside of the Roku is that the remote doesn't control the TV like power or volume which we love about the FireStick, but I guess it's the price we have to pay to get the Spectrum app. Other than that, it's a great streaming device and at a really fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Ivon Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with YouTube TV
customer_reviews.text: Not Compatible with YouTube TV. Purchased the Roku Express with the hope of using it with YouTubeTV but it is not supported. Otherwise Great device
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to changes on a certain streaming channel (not Amazon), I had to purchase replacement units. The first purchase was for my sister, so I was able to check out the quality and ease of installation before purchasing for myself. It was very easy to install and we didn't have any problems with it. I then ordered two additional units for home and am just as pleased with them. I have used the Roku brand since 2008 when I finally ditched satellite and went with local channels. I not only enjoy the local offerings, but the many free channels provided by the Roku, along with a couple of pay-to-stream channels.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Donot pay for activation !That's a scam !
customer_reviews.text: 💘 💘 love my roku . When activating it stated connection failed and referred me to call a numbet which tried to make me pay an activation fee but after going thru the motion with them ( back and fort ) my rroku tv finally becsme activated . Nothng but scammers that have somehow linked themselves to the activation process . When activating , Roku clearly states on the screen that there are no activation or service fee . They gave me a hard time , but I was not falling for their scram . I didnot pay 1 red cent for activation ! I cannot stand scammers !
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: All the streaming services plus Peloton
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly to use a bigger TV to stream the Peloton app for workouts other than using the bike. My TV is not plugged into any cable, wireless or satellite. But setting the Roku up was super easy and I was going in about 10 minutes. It was a lot to set up, not the player but the account, setting up billing, getting a code, etc. But I got onto HBO right away even though it didn't say HBO Max, I used those credentials and it worked fine. Netflix and Hulu were easy too. Searching for the Peloton app was simple and now it is on my home page ready to stream new workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay connected to internet.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but doesn’t stay connected to the internet. Picture and audio are great, when it stays connected. I tried all the trouble shooting tips but it didn’t solve my issues. Returning and buying another Fire Stick.
customer_reviews.author: CAM0897

customer_reviews.title: Roku is king
customer_reviews.text: I've had both Roku and Fire Stick before, and I'm sorry Amazon, but Roku is the best. Unlike the Fire Stick, you never have to clear the cache on this thing. It never gets bogged down and it never really lags (unless it's for a second, and it's usually an app error, not a Roku error). There are more options available on the Roku and it solidly integrates all of your accounts across the devices. So I never have to log in to every single app. Just once with my login info for DirecTv and then all apps that use that are automatically synced. Excellent usability, and easy interface.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hello Roku, I love you.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I have been a fire TV user FOREVER. I still have some in my house, but I'm replacing them with Roku units and TVs. FireTVs are slow, filled with ads, have overheating problems. It's hard to find content, and good luck with getting the Alexa remote stuff working. Roku is AWESOME - they have by far, the best and most fully featured catalog of applications and TV content. It's easy to look up content, and play native content. Did I mention how fast this UI is? Slick as butter, very responsive, and not full of a bunch of ads. I can't stress how awesome this thing is - 20 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin I. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Can be used with a computer monitor
customer_reviews.text: First of all there is no charge for activating this device, people that claimed that were either scammed or gave a bogus review... This looks great on a 1080p monitor, but you have to have a monitor with built in speakers or a headphone output, the speakers on my monitor (Sceptre 24" 1080p 75 hz) suck so I hooked up a mini soundbar using the headphone output, You also need a HDMI input CONS HDMI cable is only about 2 ft. long No volume control on remote but I knew that before I bought it HDMI only no Ethernet cable plug
customer_reviews.author: john babitsch

customer_reviews.title: Dump firestick for this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why did i wait so long? Went through 3 fire sticks since inception. Lived with chronic buffering, restarting and lag for years. This boots faster than my tv, nothing has buffered. Apps are not flaky unlike on firestick. You can watch prime, so not missing anything! No speaker hole for privacy. Win win, and cheaper than stick. I have roku tv in my room, not sure why i was hesitant to use their device as it blows fire devices out of the water. Easy setup
customer_reviews.author: Michele W.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend purchasing this streaming device. There are streaming devices that function much better. Positives: - easy to set up. - good interface. - interface functions like cable Cons: - This product only connects with 2g wifi. - Buffers frequently then goes to a lower resolution making viewing impossible. Asks for me to check network connection. When checked it is good. - Problems with Youtube TV connecting and switching between channels. Frequently had to go back to Roku "home" and then reload Youtube TV multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Better than fire stick
customer_reviews.text: Best Roku yet! I've been buying Roku devices since they first came out. I have the box, stick and now this one. It's the best I've for sure. The picture quality beats the fire stick. My fire stick was always disconnecting from the internet and the picture quality wasn't as good. Only about downside about Roku is the absence of Bluetooth capability so you have to connect through the Roku app and link it to your Bluetooth speakers. Roku has always been that way though.
customer_reviews.author: The Drewness

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today . I specifically got those for my Samsung TV because I couldn't get thr Disney Plus on. Roku was super easy to install. Has alot of great features and Disney Plus worked juat great. I wish the remote had volume control included but otherwise great product. Will update more as I use it more. UPDATE: 01/05/2020 Still love it. Great quality and software speed. Totally replaced the original Samsung one.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed H.

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were using our LG Blu Ray player to stream Netflix, Hulu, and YouTube but always had issues with lag and freezing. Eventually, Hulu would completely stop running. On top of that, there was no way for us to update our player to include streaming for Disney Plus so we decided to take a gamble on the Roku Express. Just had to plug it in, sign up for a free account, and activate it. Super easy to set up. So far, we've been able to stream all the apps we've downloaded without any issues at all. My only concern is that the device seems to get really hot after a small period of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W.

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect bluetooth keyboard. Makes signing into multiple streaming services slow and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: CANT CONNECT ANY BLUETOOTH KEYBOARDS that sucks. Have fun typing in all of your passwords with UP LEFT RIGHT DOWN button's only. VERY TIME CONSUMING and cumbersome vs. connecting 1 bluetooth keyboard or 1Keyboard on my Mac and just using that to sign up for multiple services. Different models. This model had the cheap remote without the volume control. If I get a roku I'd get the one with the volume control. But the 1st reason I gave is a dealbreaker. Too slow of a setup process and that matters if it breaks and I have to do it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT price ($21) but sluggish performance
customer_reviews.text: We have several Roku devices from early stick to Ultra. Old stick failed and were looking for replacement. This unit was inexpensive and newer than the old stick. It arrived on time. It works but is much slower than ALL my other Roku devices. Slow to boot, slow to respond to remote, slow to select menus, channels, etc. Remote has no control for TV power (so you need to keep the TV control handy). Remote also has no earphone jack. The remote connects to unit via IR (light beam not radio) so you need device visible from front of set.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Keeps loosimg connection
customer_reviews.text: I have another Roku (SKU #3900R) that works perfect and this one (SKU #3930R) that I bought later which is more compact and keeps loosing connection. I also upgraded my modem thinking that was the problem but to no avail. It also seems to have no return available. I need to be more careful in the future about Amazon purchases. The older version I got from Target and I could return it if I had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I already had 3 firesticks for my other tvs and decided to try this on a 4th tv. Roku makes you give them all your personal info as well as credit card. Obviously they are trying to pull you into their "sphere" so they can keep soaking you. However, this remote took 2 hours to load the stations and then was too slow to load causing buffering issues--none of which I have with the firesticks. Shame on Roku for allowing such a weak product to have their name on it. It went right back and I ordered another firestick (which has Alexa built in anyway). It's a whole $11 more.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Kent

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My very old ROKU player bit the dust a few months ago. I finally decided to get another one. I had no idea how cheap they are now. This little one replaced it for a fraction of the price. It arrived today and was set up in less than ten minutes. Simple. And - it works! I do not understand what fees people are talking about in these reviews. When I hooked it up there was a message clearly stating that ROKU does NOT charge fees. This player is exactly what I needed and I just wish I would have bought it sooner. The old one was archaic.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: LOSES CONNECTION TO INTERNET AFTER AN HOUR+ EVERY NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Every evening while watching a movie on Prime, this thing suddenly tells me it has lost connection to the internet. I have to go back to HOME, then back to Prime to continue watching the film. The first few minutes the film is not full resolution but then settles down. I am streaming from Xfinity (Comcast) router in the next room. This is my second experience with Roku and my original worked wonderfully for years. This is frustrating. Is anyone experiencing this? Wondering if I should try another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bldrhouse

customer_reviews.title: It works much better than you know what
customer_reviews.text: Having tried the Firestick, I find the Roku to be more response, easier to identify onscreen what is being selected, and the number one thing, I do not constantly have to unplug and plug it back in to its USB power and reset it to get it to work. Additionally, the Roku interface is straight forward. Instead of getting advertisements like one does on the Firestick, Roku provides me with the installed apps and quick links to items I need. I like it so much, I'm moving this one to the guest bedroom and buying the improved model with volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Vagrant

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Roku!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Roku setup! I purchased this as a second device to use in another room in my home. Because I already had an existing Roku account, setup was very easy after I logged in on my phone. I did have to download some apps that weren't loaded on during setup, but all has been well since purchase! I've noticed that sometimes when starting up and opening an app, I get an error stating that I need to turn my tv off and unplug the Roku from the tv and restart. I've noticed that this may have been an issue with my tv, because I've since changed it to a different HDMI port and haven't had the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Such an upgrade from our old, OLD fire stick.
customer_reviews.text: This model doesnt allow you to operate your TV (no power button or volume button) but I bought this for our dining room tv to replace our old firestick. I am so happy with the speed and quality of the streaming... I dont mind having to use the 2 remotes because we only use this tv while cooking dinner or to entertain the toddlers while doing chores... roku does offer a more universal device but this Express model is perfect for my needs. Roku streams Xfinity cable, if it werent for that we might have ordered another (newer) firestick. But I'm glad we didnt
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Young

customer_reviews.title: Lots of freezing and glitches
customer_reviews.text: I am actually a huge fan of Roku but this version of it I absolutely hate. I have issues with it freezing ALL the time. And I swear it has a motion sensor bc anytime I pause it then leave the room... once i step back in it automatically starts playing. It is the creepiest thing ever. This wasn’t just a one-time thing.. this happens every.single.time. I’m pretty frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Reem K.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok ...firestick is much faster !
customer_reviews.text: this is alright...didn't mirror very good with the smat TV...works better with the not so smart TV. ( firestick works better on both tv's) ..no internet here - mirroring is a must for decent movies - tried the satellite internet and that was a joke! Anyway this works really good once it hooks up - just seemed like a lot of aggravation with the smart tv ( took forever- but then again I don't get a good cell signal in my livingroom) works fast on the not so smart TV- hooks right up - but I do get a better cell signal in that room
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for! 1 click purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these devices. I bought this one because my Roku 3 fell in a bucket of water. I have 3 of them and I absolutely love them. I like the prices of the Rokus. You can take them anywhere.... providing you have Internet. I pay FAR less than what is asked for by satellite and cable providers. Once you have decided what you want to watch, there are packages or ala carte videos. I like it because I can binge watch tv series....catch up on movies etc. I have nothing attached to my home, or a 4 hour window wait for a installation at $90. It’s so liberating!
customer_reviews.author: Light worker in progress

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had already previously cut cable and switched to Slingtv and cut my bill in half. Then I got this Roku device and switched to Philo and cut my bill in half again. I wish I would have known about this sooner! It was very easy to connect to my tv and setup. Lots of free content available as well. I highly recommend it if you’re trying to lower your bills!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra O

customer_reviews.title: Great for streaming! Not kid proof.
customer_reviews.text: I love having my Roku! I don’t like my internet speed it kinda sucks, but the Roku is lit! And it’s extremely easy to navigate if my 19 month old baby can get the Tv on and out Disney plus on to watch Frozen for the 100th time anyone can figure out how to use the Roku. My only hang up I wish it had like a parental control that you need to put in a code before buying something. My daughter ordered ESPN :( that’s 60 bucks! I will stick with my review that the Roku is excellent and I highly recommended for streaming! Just keep the remote away from littles.
customer_reviews.author: Danidactyl

customer_reviews.title: This girl's a happy streamer once again!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I ordered this new Roku Express! My old (2014) Roku streaming stick had seen better days. My older model was SUPER SLOW at loading stations. This was so aggravating and it was time to retire the ole gal. New Roku Express was super easy to install. Took me less than 20 mins and I was up and running again. So glad I decided on this updated, faster version! No regrets now! Thanks Roku! Happy streaming!
customer_reviews.author: Manta7
